name: Pedal Rebel VR
storyline:
In a high-tech low-life cyberpunk city like this, you’ll get nowhere by playing by the rules. Your illegally modified bike is your only ticket out of this sprawl. Make your mark in the underground racing scene, or die trying.
Competing in illegal street races wins you money, but more importantly status with the various characters and gangs around the city.
Rise up the ranks and people will notice.
Will the road ahead lead you to a life of crime, fame and glory or uncover a rebellious plot to take the city back from corrupt corporate control? You’ll have to play to find out.
summary: Pedal Rebel VR is a adrenaline-pumping cyberpunk motorbike street racing game that completely transforms any exercise bike and any VR headset into an immersive racing experience!
